Add members below to give them access to: Add members below to give them access to the group. Need to add someone who’s not yet a member?
Add and remove members to the <em>{{grou: Add and remove members to the {{groupName}} group. Members of the group will have access to any collections this group has been added to.
Groups are for organizing your team. The: Grupos são para organizar sua equipe. Eles funcionam melhor quando centrados em uma função ou responsabilidade - Suporte ou Engenharia, por exemplo.

Invite members to join your workspace. T: Invite members to join your workspace. They will need to sign in with {{signinMethods}}.

Get started by choosing a sign-in method: Get started by choosing a sign-in method for your new workspace below…
You signed in with {{ authProviderName }: Você fez login com {{ authProviderName }} da última vez.
Already have an account? Go to <1>login<: Já tem uma conta? Ir para<1>login</1>.
The domain associated with your email ad: The domain associated with your email address has not been allowed for this workspace.
Unable to sign-in. Please navigate to yo: Unable to sign-in. Please navigate to your workspace's custom URL, then try to sign-in again.<1></1>If you were invited to a workspace, you will find a link to it in the invite email.
Sorry, a new account cannot be created w: Sorry, a new account cannot be created with a personal Gmail address.<1></1>Please use a Google Workspaces account instead.
The workspace you authenticated with is: The workspace you authenticated with is not authorized on this installation. Try another?
We could not read the user info supplied: We could not read the user info supplied by your identity provider.
Your account uses email sign-in, please: Your account uses email sign-in, please sign-in with email to continue.

Authentication failed – we were unable t: Authentication failed – we were unable to sign you in at this time. Please try again.
Authentication failed – you do not have: Authentication failed – you do not have permission to access this workspace.
Sorry, it looks like that sign-in link i: Sorry, it looks like that sign-in link is no longer valid, please try requesting another.
Your account has been suspended. To re-a: Your account has been suspended. To re-activate your account, please contact a workspace admin.
Authentication failed – this login metho: Authentication failed – this login method was disabled by a team admin.
The workspace you are trying to join req: The workspace you are trying to join requires an invite before you can create an account.<1></1>Please request an invite from your workspace admin and try again.
Sorry, your domain is not allowed. Pleas: Sorry, your domain is not allowed. Please try again with an allowed workspace domain.

You can create an unlimited amount of pe: Você pode criar uma quantidade ilimitada de tokens pessoais para autenticar com a API. Os tokens têm as mesmas permissões da sua conta de usuário. Para obter mais detalhes, consulte a documentação do desenvolvedor.
Are you sure you want to revoke the {{ t: Are you sure you want to revoke the {{ tokenName }} token?
The domains which should be allowed to c: The domains which should be allowed to create new accounts using SSO. Changing this setting does not affect existing user accounts.
Please choose a single file to import: Please choose a single file to import
Your import is being processed, you can: Sua importação está sendo processada, você pode sair dessa página com segurança
File not supported – please upload a val: File not supported – please upload a valid ZIP file
Drag and drop the zip file from the JSON: Drag and drop the zip file from the JSON export option in {{appName}}, or click to upload
You can import a zip file that was previ: You can import a zip file that was previously exported from the JSON option in another instance. In {{ appName }}, open Export in the Settings sidebar and click on Export Data.
Drag and drop the zip file from the Mark: Drag and drop the zip file from the Markdown export option in {{appName}}, or click to upload
You can import a zip file that was previ: You can import a zip file that was previously exported from an Outline installation – collections, documents, and images will be imported. In Outline, open Export in the Settings sidebar and click on Export Data.
Drag and drop the zip file from Notion's: Drag and drop the zip file from Notion's HTML export option, or click to upload
Where do I find the file?: Where do I find the file?
In Notion, click <em>Settings & Members<: In Notion, click Settings & Members in the left sidebar and open Settings. Look for the Export section, and click Export all workspace content. Choose HTML as the format for the best data compatability.
Unable to upload new logo: Não foi possível carregar o novo logotipo
These settings affect the way that your: Esses detalhes afetam a maneira como o Outline aparece para todos na equipe.
The logo is displayed at the top left of: O logotipo é exibido no canto superior esquerdo do aplicativo.
The workspace name, usually the same as: O nome do espaço de trabalho, geralmente igual ao nome da sua empresa.
Customize the interface look and feel.
Show your team’s logo on public pages li: Show your team’s logo on public pages like login and shared documents.
Your knowledge base will be accessible a: Sua base de conhecimento estará acessível em
Choose a subdomain to enable a login pag: Choose a subdomain to enable a login page just for your team.
This is the screen that workspace member: Esta é a tela que os membros da equipe verão pela primeira vez quando fizerem login.
A full export might take some time, cons: A full export might take some time, consider exporting a single document or collection. The exported data is a zip of your documents in Markdown format. You may leave this page once the export has started – if you have notifications enabled, we will email a link to {{ userEmail }} when it’s complete.
Manage optional and beta features. Chang: Manage optional and beta features. Changing these settings will affect the experience for all members of the workspace.
When enabled documents are always editab: When enabled documents are always editable for team members that have permission. When disabled there is a separate editing view.
When enabled team members can add commen: When enabled team members can add comments to documents.
Add a Google Analytics 4 measurement ID: Add a Google Analytics 4 measurement ID to send document views and analytics from the workspace to your own Google Analytics account.
Create a \"Web\" stream in your Google A: Create a "Web" stream in your Google Analytics admin dashboard and copy the measurement ID from the generated code snippet to install.
Groups can be used to organize and manag: Grupos podem ser usados para organizar e gerenciar as pessoas da sua equipe.
Quickly transfer your existing documents: Quickly transfer your existing documents, pages, and files from other tools and services into {{appName}}. You can also drag and drop any HTML, Markdown, and text documents directly into Collections in the app.
Import a zip file of Markdown documents: Import a zip file of Markdown documents (exported from version 0.67.0 or earlier)
Import a JSON data file exported from an: Import a JSON data file exported from another {{ appName }} instance
Import pages from a Confluence instance: Importar páginas de uma instância do Confluence
Everyone that has signed into {{appName}: Everyone that has signed into {{appName}} is listed here. It’s possible that there are other users who have access through {team.signinMethods} but haven’t signed in yet.
Receive a notification whenever a new do: Receba uma notificação sempre que um novo documento for publicado
Receive a notification when a document y: Receive a notification when a document you are subscribed to is edited
Receive a notification when a document you are subscribed to or a thread you participated in receives a comment
Receive a notification when someone ment: Receive a notification when someone mentions you in a document or comment
Receive a notification whenever a new co: Receba uma notificação sempre que uma nova coleção for criada
Receive a notification when someone you: Receive a notification when someone you invited creates an account
Receive a notification when an export yo: Receive a notification when an export you requested has been completed
Tips on getting started with features an: Tips on getting started with features and functionality
Receive an email when new features of no: Receba um email quando novos recursos de nota forem adicionados
Unsubscription successful. Your notifica: Cancelamento bem-sucedido. Suas configurações de notificação foram atualizadas
Manage when and where you receive email: Gerencie quando e onde você recebe notificações por e-mail.
Your email address should be updated in: Your email address should be updated in your SSO provider.
The email integration is currently disab: A integração de e-mail está atualmente desativada. Defina as variáveis de ambiente associadas e reinicie o servidor para ativar as notificações.
Manage settings that affect your persona: Gerencie as configurações que afetam sua experiência pessoal.
Choose the interface language. Community: Escolha o idioma da interface. As traduções da comunidade são aceitas através do nosso <2>portal de tradução</2>.
Show a hand cursor when hovering over in: Mostre um cursor de mão ao passar o mouse sobre os elementos interativos.
Show line numbers on code blocks in docu: Show line numbers on code blocks in documents.
Automatically return to the document you: Retorne automaticamente ao documento que você estava visualizando pela última vez quando o aplicativo for reaberto.
You may delete your account at any time,: Você pode excluir sua conta a qualquer momento, note que isso não é recuperável
Unable to upload new profile picture: Não foi possível carregar a nova imagem de perfil
Manage how you appear to other members o: Gerencie como você aparece para outros membros do espaço de trabalho.
Choose a photo or image to represent you: Escolha uma foto ou imagem para se representar.
This could be your real name, or a nickn: Este pode ser o seu nome verdadeiro ou um apelido — como você gostaria que as pessoas se referissem a você.
Are you sure you want to require invites: Are you sure you want to require invites?
New users will first need to be invited: New users will first need to be invited to create an account. Default role and Allowed domains will no longer apply.
Settings that impact the access, securit: Configurações que afetam o acesso, a segurança e o conteúdo de sua base de conhecimento.
Allow members to sign-in with {{ authPro: Allow members to sign-in with {{ authProvider }}
Allow members to sign-in using their ema: Allow members to sign-in using their email address
The server must have SMTP configured to: O servidor deve ter o SMTP configurado para habilitar esta configuração
Require members to be invited to the wor: Require members to be invited to the workspace before they can create an account using SSO.
The default user role for new accounts. Changing this setting does not affect existing user accounts.
When enabled, documents can be shared pu: When enabled, documents can be shared publicly on the internet by any member of the workspace
When enabled, viewers can see download o: When enabled, viewers can see download options for documents
Links to supported services are shown as: Links para serviços suportados são exibidos como incorporações ricas nos seus documentos
Allow members to create new collections: Allow members to create new collections within the knowledge base
Add your self-hosted draw.io installatio: Add your self-hosted draw.io installation url here to enable automatic embedding of diagrams within documents.
O compartilhamento está desativado no momento.
You can globally enable and disable publ: Você pode ativar e desativar globalmente o compartilhamento público de documentos nas configurações de segurança.
Documents that have been shared are list: Os documentos que foram compartilhados estão listados abaixo. Qualquer pessoa que tenha o link público pode acessar uma versão somente leitura do documento até que o link seja revogado.
Zapier is a platform that allows {{appNa: Zapier is a platform that allows {{appName}} to easily integrate with thousands of other business tools. Automate your workflows, sync data, and more.
Your are creating a new workspace using: Your are creating a new workspace using your current account — {{email}}
When your new workspace is created, you: When your new workspace is created, you will be the admin, meaning you will have the highest level of permissions and the ability to invite others.
You can create templates to help your te: Você pode criar modelos para ajudar sua equipe a criar documentação consistente e precisa.
A Lixeira está vazia no momento.
A confirmation code has been sent to you: A confirmation code has been sent to your email address, please enter the code below to permanantly destroy your account.
<em>Note:</em> Signing back in will caus: Observação: Fazer login novamente fará com que uma nova conta seja reprovisionada automaticamente.
Are you sure? Deleting your account will: Are you sure? Deleting your account will destroy identifying data associated with your user and cannot be undone. You will be immediately logged out of {{appName}} and all your API tokens will be revoked.
These events should be posted to Slack: Esses eventos devem ser postados no Slack
Whoops, you need to accept the permissio: Whoops, you need to accept the permissions in Slack to connect {{appName}} to your team. Try again?
Something went wrong while authenticatin: Algo deu errado durante a autenticação da sua solicitação. Por favor, pode tentar fazer o login novamente?
Get rich previews of {{ appName }} links: Get rich previews of {{ appName }} links shared in Slack and use the {{ command }} slash command to search for documents without leaving your chat.
Connect {{appName}} collections to Slack: Connect {{appName}} collections to Slack channels. Messages will be automatically posted to Slack when documents are published or updated.
The Slack integration is currently disab: A integração do Slack está desativada no momento. Defina as variáveis de ambiente associadas e reinicie o servidor para habilitar a integração.
To search your knowledgebase use {{ comm:
To search your knowledgebase use {{ command }}. 
You’ve already learned how to get help with {{ command2 }}.
Sorry, we couldn’t find an integration f: Sorry, we couldn’t find an integration for your team. Head to your {{ appName }} settings to set one up.
It looks like you haven’t signed in to {: It looks like you haven’t signed in to {{ appName }} yet, so results may be limited
This is what we found for \"{{ term }}\": This is what we found for "{{ term }}"
Are you sure you want to delete the {{ n: Are you sure you want to delete the {{ name }} webhook?
Provide a descriptive name for this webh: Provide a descriptive name for this webhook and the URL we should send a POST request to when matching events are created.
Subscribe to all events, groups, or indi: Subscribe to all events, groups, or individual events. We recommend only subscribing to the minimum amount of events that your application needs to function.
Webhooks can be used to notify your appl: Webhooks can be used to notify your application when events happen in {{appName}}. Events are sent as a https request with a JSON payload in near real-time.
